titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to appoint a harmful algal bloom coordinator.
A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to appoint a harmful algal bloom coordinator.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, acting as chair of the Great Lakes Interagency Task Force, to appoint a coordinator to work with appropriate governments to address harmful algal blooms in the Great Lakes.
